Package com.joliciel.talismane.parser

Transition-based dependency parsing (Parser), evaluation (ParserEvaluator), and output artefacts (ParseConfiguration, DependencyNode).

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    DependencyArc
    A dependency arc, indicating a dependency relationship between two pos-tagged tokens, one of which is the head and one of which is the dependent, with a particular functional label (e.g.
    DependencyNode
    A node inside a dependency tree.
    NonDeterministicParser
    A non-deterministic parser, which analyses multiple pos-tagging possibilities for this sentence, and returns multiple parse configurations.
    ParseComparator
    Compare two annotated corpora, one serving as reference and the other as an evaluation.
    ParseComparisonStrategy
    The strategy for deciding which parses need to be compared with each other.
    ParseConfiguration
    A sequence of dependency arcs applied to a given sequence of pos-tagged tokens, as well as the stack and buffer indicating the pos-tagged tokens already visited and not yet visited.
    ParseConfigurationProcessor
    Any class that can process parse configurations generated by the parser.
    ParseEvaluationObserver
    An interface that observes a parsing evaluation while its occurring.
    Parser
    A syntax parser which takes a pos tag sequence and provides a parse configuration.
    ParserAnnotatedCorpusReader
    An interface for reading ParseConfigurations from sentences in a corpus.
    ParserEvaluator
    Evaluate a parser.
    ParserRegexBasedCorpusReader
    A corpus reader that expects one pos-tagged token with dependency info per line, and analyses the line content based on a regex supplied during construction.
    ParserService  
    ParsingConstrainer
    An interface used to constrain the parsing, based on information found in the training corpus.
    Transition
    A single transition in a transition-based parsing system.
    TransitionBasedParser  
    TransitionSystem
    A set of transitions that can be applied to a configuration to give a particular set of target dependencies.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractTransition  
    ForceReduceTransition
    Special transition for ungoverned punctuation, so as not to consider it explicitly as depending on root, and not to create non-projectivity.
    LeftArcEagerTransition
    Create a dependency where Stack[0] depends on Buffer[0], and pop Stack[0].
    LeftArcTransition
    Create a dependency where Stack[0] depends on Buffer[0], and pop Stack[0].
    ParseConfigurationProcessorChain  
    ParseEvaluationFScoreCalculator
    Calculates the f-score during a parse evaluation.
    ParseEvaluationGuessTemplateWriter
    Simply a wrapper for the FreemarkerTemplateWriter, writing the best guess using a freemarker template.
    ParseEvaluationObserverImpl  
    ParseEvaluationSentenceWriter
    Writes each sentence to a CSV file as it gets parsed, along with the guesses made and their probability.
    ParserFScoreCalculatorByDistance
    Calculates the f-score for each separate distance during a parse evaluation.
    ParserRegexBasedCorpusReaderImpl  
    ParserRegexBasedCorpusReaderImpl.ParseDataLine  
    ParserServiceImpl  
    ParserServiceLocator  
    ParseTimeByLengthObserver  
    ReduceTransition
    Reduce the stack, by popping Stack[0], without creating a new dependency.
    RightArcEagerTransition
    Create a dependency where Buffer[0] depends on Stack[0], and push Buffer[0] to the top of the stack.
    RightArcTransition
    Create a dependency where Buffer[0] depends on Stack[0], remove Buffer[0], and put Stack[0] in its place.
    ShiftTransition
    Shift Buffer[0] over to Stack[0], without creating a new dependency.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Parser.ParseComparisonStrategyType  
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    CircularDependencyException  
    InvalidTransitionException  
    UnknownDependencyLabelException
    Thrown when the dependency label requested does not exist in the current set of dependency labels.

Package com.joliciel.talismane.parser Description

Transition-based dependency parsing (Parser), evaluation (ParserEvaluator), and output artefacts (ParseConfiguration, DependencyNode).
